sentences.sentence: Meteorologists have predicted mild rains for the next few days.
sentences.translation: 气象学家们已经预测接下来的几天有小雨。

sentences.sentence: Unlike meteorologists, however, they cannot rely on observations made in their own lifetimes.
sentences.translation: 然而，与气象学家不同的是，他们不能依靠自己有生之年所做的观察。

sentences.sentence: Meteorologists can see the weather of any part of the world.
sentences.translation: 气象学家可以看到世界上任何地方的天气。
